title: CRAZY

description.plain:
The house-pop anthem “CRAZY,” serves as the title track to LE SSERAFIM’s fourth mini-album of the same name.

Lyrically, “CRAZY” is about having fun and going crazy—as the members also sing about embracing their ‘crazy’ and quirky personalities. Sonically, the song is upbeat, hard-hitting, and phonk-pop, making it a fun song to dance or feel yourself to.

In the music video, LE SSERAFIM can be seen in stylish and obscure clothing in bewildering scenery. In the discography, the members hit popular dance moves, such as ‘voguing.’ The move is a modern dance that was stylized in Harlem in late 1980’s.

Additionally, the music video is also highly edited, making it seem more random, unexpected to the viewer—tying in closely with the overall ‘quirky’ concept of the title track.

embed_content: Read “CRAZY” by LE SSERAFIM on Genius

body.plain:
The house-pop anthem “CRAZY,” serves as the title track to LE SSERAFIM’s fourth mini-album of the same name.

Lyrically, “CRAZY” is about having fun and going crazy—as the members also sing about embracing their ‘crazy’ and quirky personalities. Sonically, the song is upbeat, hard-hitting, and phonk-pop, making it a fun song to dance or feel yourself to.

In the music video, LE SSERAFIM can be seen in stylish and obscure clothing in bewildering scenery. In the discography, the members hit popular dance moves, such as ‘voguing.’ The move is a modern dance that was stylized in Harlem in late 1980’s.

Additionally, the music video is also highly edited, making it seem more random, unexpected to the viewer—tying in closely with the overall ‘quirky’ concept of the title track.
